00053 struct block_request *block_alloc_request(struct block_device *bdev)
00054 {
00055         struct block_request    *req;
00056 
00057         assert(bdev);
00058         assert(bdev->alloc_req);
00059 
00060         req = bdev->alloc_req(bdev);
00061         if (likely(req))
00062                 req->bdev = bdev;
00063         else
00064                 dbg_warning("block: failed to allocate request from dev %p\n",
00065                                 bdev);
00066 
00067         return req;
00068 }

00077 void block_free_request(struct block_device *bdev, struct block_request *req)
00078 {
00079         assert(bdev->free_req);
00080 
00081         if (!req)
00082                 return;
00083 
00084         assert(bdev == req->bdev);
00085 
00086         bdev->free_req(bdev, req);
00087 }
